Program_Title: Paul Ryan on ABC World News with Diane Sawyer

Headlines:
Full story from ABC: http://abcnews.go.com/Politics/rep-pa...

Paul Ryan says he sees controlling the debt as a moral obligation. "I would say that what is draconian is doing nothing and lying to the American people about these fiscal problems that we have," he said.
